nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: The Clone Wars

LEGO Star Wars: The Clone Wars is a subtheme of LEGO Star Wars sets based on the television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars that has been running since 2008. A number of sets and minifgures from the Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith subthemes were redesigned, and the subtheme includes sets based on episodes from all seven seasons of The Clone Wars.
